of a decision to write this does a couple of things first of all I'll tell you this is really interesting this is
all the way to the top of the company when a decision needs to be made the the group making the decision let's say
seven or eight individuals they will have an hourlong meeting come together in a room they meet for an hour and um
at the beginning of the hour for the first 30 minutes they just read absolute silence just reading for
30 minutes and at the end of 30 minutes everybody says okay are you done reading yeah we're done let's discuss so for the
next 30 minutes there's a discussion some questions answers and a decision
now what this does is it forces everybody in the room first of all to read the document right because you
can't just say oh forgot to read it it didn't do the homework um but it also level sets everybody because somebody
that read it just before the meeting is going to have it much more freshly in their mind than someone who read it two weeks ago if everybody reads it right
there right next to one another then you're all level set going into this the other piece I think is even more

necessarily think this maybe this our bookish background but when you write down this text you have to take a stand
on things if you write a sentence of Pros it has a a noun and a verb and and you have to decide what you mean you
can't just throw a bullet up on a board and say well yeah that's the bullet

is customer Obsession um if anything else Amazon is a customer company that's

process we call working backwards that is to say today when we have a proposed
product or service for the future uh you know maybe it's 18 months maybe it's three years from now maybe it's five
years from now we have an idea for that proposed product or service and today we will write a press release and a
detailed FAQ to be released then in the future so we actually go through the the
very detailed writing of the release in the FAQ what does that do for us well first of all that holds us accountable
it says that you know that product or service that we're deciding today to work on we're going to stick with it by
having something in writing imagining that that's what's going to go out to the press and public therefore um at
some point in the future so it holds us accountable it keeps the goal in mind because you know two years into it you

it was similar to auctions except it was fixed price sales and so we would allow sellers to come into our website our
